t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

Start your brand’s Amazon.in journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits. You can enroll your brand even if you don’t sell in the Amazon.in store.

t: Amazon Brand Store Optimization: A Guide to Maximize Sales
s: December 27, 2024 - Customers can also find your Brand Store through Sponsored Brand ads, which link directly to the store. This allows buyers to explore your full product range and learn more about your brand in one place. A seller must be enrolled in the Amazon Brand Registry program to have a Brand Store.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Brand name discrepancies: Ensure that the brand name you provide during enrollment matches the trademark text exactly. Pay attention to spaces and symbols to prevent discrepancies. t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect and Build Your Brand
s: Amazon Brand Registry is a programme designed to protect your intellectual property, offering sellers an exclusive set of brand benefit tools. Explore them now!
